source.daf3cb57:
# Introduction[](#Introduction)

Iris dataset is said to be the the first step towards Machine Learning and through this dataset, I will try to elloborate different aspects of machine learning. The Iris dataset was used in R.A. Fisher's classic 1936 paper, and is one of the most prominant datasets for classification problem.
source.ff6f5dc9: This shows that our data consist of 150 samples and 6 columns. All the independent variables are numeric and dependent variable is categorical.
source.360ec141: Here we have given Sepal and Petal length and width using which we have to classsify the species of the leaf.
source.7da76a45: In the upcoming versions, I will focus more on data viz explanation and classifying using other models like Decision Tree, Random Forest, XGBoost and ANN.
source.2440cb9c: So we got 81% accuracy with logistic regression. Let's find out other models accuracy.
source.fb082073: We can see through the graph that we can classify Iris-Setosa with petal or sepal width and length. But its difficult to find the other two without modeling.
